name: Opal - Chiffon silk scarf
description:
Our "Opal" range is a stunning mix of colours, reflecting the colour combinations found in the Australian gemstone, the Opal. The colour combinations may vary from batch to batch but are always a rich selection of primary colours.

This chiffon is slightly different to our crinkle chiffon range, and has a much sheerer, smoother finish.
As it is 100% silk it is so soft and would suit even the most sensitive of skin types. The perfect alternative to wool!

Chiffon is a slightly more transparent silk and is so soft to touch. It is the ideal scarf for those in-between times when you don't want the bulk of a woollen scarf. This scarf is heaven to wear.

It measures 22cm (8.6") x 180cm (70.8").

Please note: as each scarf is a one off original and individually hand dyed there may slight differences to the picture shown.

The scarf comes beautifully packaged - making it an ideal gift for a loved one! (see pic for example of packaging).
 
Prices are in Australian dollars

name: Bushfire - Chiffon Silk Scarf

name: MULTI-BUY SPECIAL - Three scarves for $35!
description:
Choose any three of your favourite $15 Habotai Silk Scarves and pay only $35! Just select this option and let us know your three preferred colour options.

Colour choices are:
Bush Floor
Bushfire
Boronia
Wattle
Gum Leaves
Hardenbergia
Opal
Reef
True Blue
Waratah

Each scarf will come individually wrapped, making them an ideal gift for Mum, Mother-in-law, Auntie, Sister, Gran, Neighbour, Cousin, Teacher ... the list goes on!

Each scarf is 100% silk and would suit even the most sensitive of skin types. The perfect alternative to wool.

Scarves measure 20cm (7.8") x 132cm (51.9").

Feel free to contact us if you have questions or would like a scarf custom made.

name: Ferns In The Rusty Tank
description:
A silk hanging mounted on dyed woollen fabric.
The painting was done using wax resist and enhanced with thread.
Silk used was habotai and organza.
A found metal bar had been used as the hanger.
Size:45cm x 75cm

name: Shine
description:
This small mixed media painting (24cm x33cm) is mainly dyed silk, enhanced with thread and metal.
It represents early morning reflected light.
The silk has been stretched and adhered to a canvas, so no framing is required.
